#
# .chatfilter.txt
# This file stores the macro templates for the chat filter module. Do not edit this file.
#

# Filter for config []
Filter[].Script=IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%,"Bad command.");<BR />        FILTER();<BR />ENDIF;<BR />IFBEGINSWITH(%CHATCLEAN%,"To");<BR />        FILTER();<BR />ENDIF;<BR /><BR />
